channel.title: Histograms on Ronald's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Histograms on Ronald's Blog

item.title: Histograms
item.description: library(Lahman) library(sqldf) library(ggplot2) A histogram is a visual data representation using one column of data. In the code below, we ran a query looking for player weights from the Master table. query<-"SELECT weight FROM Master" result<-sqldf(query) ggplot()+ geom_histogram(data=result,aes(x=weight),color="green",fill="white",bins=50)+ ggtitle("Body Weight Distribution for Baseball Players")
